title: Hello world
body:
**Bael is a free template that gives you an easy way to start a blog that uses modern technologies like static-site JAMstack architecture, CSS grid layout, responsive design, fuzzy search, and all wrapped up in a brutalist aesthetic. **

Bael runs using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, Netlify CMS, and is hosted by Netlify. It uses Buzzfeed's Solid CSS style guide for atomic, immutable styling.
